Name: Scout
Details: EXPERTISE: Tactics A Master Tactician able to move earlier than other units and who enjoys more precision when taking Called Shot opportunities. Effective at spotting targets via Sensor Lock and taking better advantage of indirect fire opportunities. Weapon minimum ranges are also improved. SPECIALIZATION: Piloting Skilled in handling a 'Mech and avoiding damage through the use of Sure Footing, and better at hitting with Melee attacks. Has an increased threshold at which piloted 'Mechs become UNSTEADY.
